link_to_all_lights.description: [bool]If true then link to all lights whether they are tagged or not.

power_on_event.description: [string]What event to fire to relevant units when powered on

power_off_event.description: [string]What event to fire to relevant units when powered of

power_on_flicker_event.description: [string]What event to fire to relevant units when powered on (and this element is set to flicker)

turn_on_during_extraction.description: [bool]If true then set enabled when extraction is triggered

auto_activate_night.description: [bool]Turn on and off auto activate during the day night cycle
